creator: mike@lillhult.com
text:
Created attachment 31007
Snapshot of the testplan with disabled MC called TF set variables in effect.

According to original description of Test Fragment, as found in https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=50475, Test Fragment content was not intended to execute when starting the testplan.

When running the testplan shown in the attachment, the last Test Fragment UDV values are in effect after executing the enabled Module Controller.

It should probably work like this:
The Test Fragments contained Config Elements should not be executed unless called for, by an enabled Module Controller in the Thread Group.

/Mike
